title: Rainbow Unicorn Plush Toy
description: A soft and cuddly unicorn toy with rainbow mane and tail. Perfect for hugging and playing.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this unicorn! It's so soft and colorful.

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: Nice toy, but a bit smaller than expected.

title: Kids Puzzle Set
description: A set of four puzzles with different themes: animals, vehicles, fruits and shapes. Each puzzle has 16 pieces and is made of durable cardboard.

reviews.name: Charlie
reviews.comment: Great puzzles for kids. They are easy to assemble and have nice pictures.

reviews.name: Diana
reviews.comment: The puzzles are OK, but some pieces are bent and don't fit well.

title: Kids Painting Kit
description: A kit that includes 12 colors of washable paint, 6 brushes, 2 palettes, and a sketchbook. Ideal for unleashing your kid's creativity.

reviews.name: Evan
reviews.comment: My son loves this kit. He paints every day and the colors are bright and easy to clean.

reviews.name: Fiona
reviews.comment: Good quality kit, but the sketchbook is a bit small.

title: Kids Lego Set
description: A set of 300 Lego bricks in various colors and shapes. Great for building anything your kid can imagine.

reviews.name: George
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this Lego set. She plays with it every day and makes different things.

reviews.name: Hannah
reviews.comment: Nice Lego set, but some pieces are missing.

title: Kids Bicycle
description: A sturdy and safe bicycle for kids aged 5 to 10. It has a steel frame, 16-inch wheels, front and rear brakes, and a basket.

reviews.name: Isaac
reviews.comment: My son loves this bicycle. It's easy to ride and looks cool.

reviews.name: Jenny
reviews.comment: The bicycle is OK, but the basket is broken.

title: Kids Storybook
description: A collection of 10 classic fairy tales for kids, such as Cinderella, Snow White, and The Little Mermaid. Illustrated with colorful pictures and easy to read text.

reviews.name: Kevin
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this storybook. She reads it every night before bed.

reviews.name: Laura
reviews.comment: Nice storybook, but some pages are torn.

title: Kids Keyboard
description: A musical keyboard for kids with 37 keys, 8 tones, 8 rhythms, and 6 demo songs. It also has a microphone, a speaker, and a record function.

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.comment: My son loves this keyboard. He plays with it every day and sings along with the microphone.

reviews.name: Nora
reviews.comment: The keyboard is OK, but the speaker is too loud.

title: Kids Costume Set
description: A set of four costumes for kids to dress up as their favorite characters: a pirate, a princess, a superhero, and a dinosaur. Each costume includes a hat, a mask, and an outfit.

reviews.name: Olivia
reviews.comment: My kids love this costume set. They play with it every day and pretend to be different characters.

reviews.name: Peter
reviews.comment: Nice costume set, but the dinosaur mask is too big.

title: Kids Science Kit
description: A kit that includes 12 fun and educational science experiments for kids, such as making slime, growing crystals, and erupting a volcano. It comes with a manual, a safety goggles, and all the necessary materials.

reviews.name: Rachel
reviews.comment: My kids love this science kit. They learn a lot and have fun at the same time.

reviews.name: Sam
reviews.comment: The science kit is OK, but some materials are missing.

title: Kids Dollhouse
description: A wooden dollhouse with four rooms, a balcony, and a staircase. It comes with 6 dolls, furniture, and accessories. It can be opened and closed for easy storage.

reviews.name: Tina
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this dollhouse. She plays with it every day and makes up stories.

reviews.name: Victor
reviews.comment: Nice dollhouse, but the staircase is loose.
